commands.name: _shared/branch-validation
commands.when: Validating branch names and git state in /git:branch and /git:fix-pr
commands.purpose: Reusable validation patterns for branch creation, name compliance, and git state checks

commands.name: _shared/commit-formatting
commands.purpose: Shared commit message formatting standards and conventional commit patterns
commands.example: Create conventional commit for completed feature

commands.name: _shared/common-git-workflow
commands.when: Following git best practices across all git commands
commands.purpose: Git workflow best practices including branch protection, commit hygiene, and push/pull patterns

commands.name: _shared/error-handling
commands.when: Handling git errors and recovery in /git:branch, /git:fix-pr, and other git commands
commands.purpose: Comprehensive error detection, messaging, and recovery patterns for common git failure modes

commands.name: accessibility:audit
commands.purpose: Run accessibility audit using axe-core to validate WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

commands.name: adr:draft
commands.purpose: Draft ADR when governance triggers occur (prompts, workflows, security, compliance changes).

commands.name: code
commands.purpose: Coding standards via implementation-assistant Skill

commands.name: db
commands.purpose: Database workflow via supabase-integration Skill

commands.name: db:migrate
commands.purpose: Streamline Supabase database migration workflow with validation and RLS policy checks.

commands.name: design - Design System Management
commands.purpose: Proactive UI generation and automated design system enforcement

commands.name: dev:init-new-app
commands.purpose: Initialize a new app from this starter with customized configuration.

commands.name: dev:refactor-secure
commands.purpose: Improve code clarity and performance while checking OWASP Top 10 security risks.
commands.example: Add security improvements to API endpoints

commands.name: docs - Documentation Sync
commands.purpose: Documentation synchronization and validation

commands.name: docs:generate
commands.purpose: Update documentation from code and tests when docs are outdated.

commands.name: git - Unified Git Workflow
commands.purpose: Unified git workflow automation with intelligent routing

commands.name: git:branch
commands.purpose: Create a new git branch following standardized naming conventions.

commands.name: git:commit
commands.purpose: Generate a Conventional Commit message for staged changes.
commands.example: Create conventional commit for completed feature

commands.name: git:fix-pr
commands.purpose: Automatically address PR feedback from CI checks, CodeRabbit, and doctor failures.

commands.name: git:prepare-pr
commands.purpose: Create conventional commit and PR body when ready to submit changes.

commands.name: git:tag-release
commands.purpose: Create semantic version from conventional commits when ready to release.

commands.name: git:workflow
commands.purpose: Manage git branch lifecycle using consolidated workflow operations.

commands.name: github:create-issue
commands.purpose: Create a GitHub issue from current planning discussion with proper template.
commands.example: Create GitHub issue with proper templates

commands.name: github:github-learning-capture
commands.purpose: Update an existing issue with implementation outcomes and learnings.
commands.example: Create GitHub issue with proper templates

commands.name: github:update-wiki
commands.purpose: Generated wiki content updates
commands.example: Create GitHub issue with proper templates

commands.name: learn
commands.purpose: Search micro-lessons by tags, keywords, or patterns to find relevant learnings.

commands.name: ops:learning-capture
commands.purpose: Capture development insights, patterns, or decisions as micro-lessons with intelligent context detection and automatic indexing.

commands.name: ops:wiki-sync
commands.purpose: Verify docs/PRD.md and docs/wiki/WIKI-PRD.md are in sync, auto-fix if needed.

commands.name: pr:assist
commands.purpose: Auto-fill PR template with traceability IDs and metadata before opening PR.

commands.name: quality:run-linter
commands.purpose: Execute linting and fix all quality issues before commits.

commands.name: QUICK_REFERENCE
commands.when: Fast command discovery and lookup without reading full documentation
commands.purpose: Consolidated quick reference guide for 5 discovery commands and Skills catalog with progressive disclosure architecture

commands.name: README
commands.when: Understanding slash command system and available commands
commands.purpose: Overview of slash command architecture, usage patterns, and command catalog

commands.name: research:explore
commands.purpose: Deep codebase exploration to answer questions about architecture, patterns, or implementation details.

commands.name: review - Code Quality Review
commands.when: Setting up tests and TDD workflows
commands.purpose: Automated code quality checks and review

commands.name: review:self-critique
commands.purpose: Start fresh session and skeptically review recent changes for quality.

commands.name: security:scan
commands.purpose: Scan codebase for security vulnerabilities including RLS policies, auth issues, and OWASP Top 10.

commands.name: skills-stats
commands.purpose: Display Skills usage statistics and analytics

commands.name: spec
commands.purpose: Spec analysis via prd-analyzer Skill

commands.name: test
commands.when: Setting up tests and TDD workflows
commands.purpose: TDD workflow via test-scaffolder Skill
